entry.title: Israel Bombs Gaza, Struggles to Expel Hamas Intruders
entry.content: The death toll since the start of the fighting jumped to more than 500 Israelis and at least 313 Palestinians.

entry.title: Meatpacking Plant Closures Cut Deep for Small-Town Economies
entry.content: Tyson Foods and other meat processors are closing plants amid high costs and falling demand, spelling economic turbulence for the communities where the plants are major employers.

entry.title: For Trump, the New York Fraud Trial Is Personal
entry.content: Friends of the former president say the case is the one that hits closest to his business and self-image.

entry.title: Israel Declares War on Hamas After Surprise Assault From Gaza
entry.content: Hamas fired thousands of rockets as far north as Tel Aviv and sent fighters into southern cities near the border.
